review: Garbage.  Bought this thing to stream Netflix to my TV.  Will work fine for awhile, then re-buffers and gets stuck on "Loading 99%".  If I reboot the device and/or my phone and/or my wi-fi router, it'll will buy me some minutes of uninterrupted watching, but then the hang-up happens again, and again, and again.Meanwhile, get this:  When I try streaming Netflix directly to my PC (i.e. bypassing the Chromecast), all is well.  It will sometimes glitch momentarily, and in a great while will have to re-buffer, but never to the outrageous extent that this Chromecast thing does.What a waste of money.  I'm going to throw this thing in the trash and buy a DVD / Blu-Ray  player that offers Netflix streaming and whatnot, and then hope for the best.
